name: Lavakin Brawler
originalText: Whenever Lavakin Brawler attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.

rulings.text: The size of the bonus is determined as Lavakin Brawler’s ability begins to resolve; it won’t change later in the turn if the number of Elementals you control changes.
Because Lavakin Brawler is itself an Elemental, its ability will usually give it at least +1/+0.

text: Whenever Lavakin Brawler attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.
